about_the_game:
Prepare for heart-pounding competition in a spine-chilling multiplayer experience! Project Blind plunges players into a gripping multiplayer horror where they must navigate a darkened map, wielding their flashlight and weapons to locate keycards and outmaneuver their rivals. But beware, amidst the shadows, not only do you contend with opposing players, but also a malevolent entity relentlessly stalking its prey. Devise cunning strategies, forge alliances, and unearth terrifying secrets as you strive to emerge victorious in Project Blind!



Multiplayer Competition:

Engage in fierce competition with friends or players worldwide as you vie for survival in the darkened place.


Strategic Prowess:

Outsmart and outplay your adversaries while dodging the sinister entity, carefully use your flashlight and weapon to gain the upper hand.


Proximity Chat:

Coordinate with your teammates, devise tactics, and share spine-chilling moments using the built-in voice chat feature.

HOW TO PLAY?
You will find yourself in a dark space with your opponents.
You all have a flashlight and a pistol.
To get off the map you need to find the keycard for the main exit door.
If you don't use the flashlight and the pistol in a proper controlled way, you will be seen and others can kill you and eliminate you.
And remember, you have to be careful of a ghost that wants to hunt you.


Project Blind will receive regular content and fixing updates.

Here is the upcoming features list:
  • Two brand new maps. Office and hospital
  • In-game tactical objects. Traps, heartbeat sensors, flash grenades and more
  • New characters and Character selection feature
  • In-game puzzles

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: Sonoma
  • Processor: Apple M1 Pro
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You need to have a stable internet connection to play
mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: Sonoma
  • Processor: Apple M1 Pro
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You need to have a stable internet connection to play

name: Project Blind

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 CPU 3.00GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GForce GTX 1050
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Better with headphones
  • Additional Notes: You need to have a stable internet connection to play

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Better with headphones
  • Additional Notes: You need to have a stable internet connection to play

short_description: Project Blind is an online multiplayer thriller, where you must outsmart others to break free from a sinister realm. Compete head-to-head with friends or foes online as you navigate through the shadows and strive to uncover the path to freedom! Talk with your opponents with a proximity chat!
